description: This file defines a custom React hook `useNotes` which manages a list of notes with functionalities including loading, selecting, creating, updating, and deleting notes. It interacts with an external `notesService` for data persistence and handles optimistic UI updates and error management.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the list of notes from the notesService and updates the state.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Sets the currently selected note by ID.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads the notes list from the external service.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with optimistic UI update, replacing temporary ID with the real one from the server.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note's fields with optimistic UI, reverting if the server update fails.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note with optimistic UI, reverting if deletion on server fails.
